ygData.subject: RE: Sister Isle..........
ygData.msgSnippet: ... just dont get too nosy, especially around the bars.  there is a bar on the dock where an ogre paladin (?!) is, and he has gladly ripped me a new one
ygData.messageBody:
>I always go the nro to freeport way to get on
>boat and never have had a problem, but you can stand on the dock all day
>long and no npc will bother you.

just dont get too nosy, especially around the bars. there is a bar on the
dock where an ogre paladin (?!) is, and he has gladly ripped me a new one
before. there is also a bard and (i think) a ranger in another bar, and a
dwarf warrior in another... the point is, just dont go to bars in freeport.

belphenor
